ai.agents

Class CardAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • ai.agents.CardAgent

  • public class CardAgent
extends java.lang.Object
    Tracks all cards, and what strategy to use when having the cards, or seeing the cards getting purchased.

    • Constructor Summary

      Instantiates a new card agent.
